document_data.caption: Several maps of the Starmantle Bay and surrounding area
document_data.name: Starmantle Bay
document_data.mainbody: '''Starmantle Bay''' was a body of water found along the [[Dragon Coast]], in the southwestern waters of the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].

Geography.Geographical Features: The bay was fed by the [[North Cedar River|North]] and [[South Cedar River]]s, that flowed north from the [[Orbrekh]] and [[Orsraun Mountains]] in [[Turmish]].

document_data.Notable Locations: * [[Faenasour]], a community of [[aquatic elves]] situated under the waters of the bay.
document_data.Inhabitants: The [[mist dragon]] [[Shalamalauth]] was said to dwell in Starmantle Bay before his death.
